channel.title: FINally!
channel.description:
I finally deafeated quest dragon slayer! it was actualy easy i used a lot of health and i had a addy full on, time to mine and get cash to buy full rune!!!!!!! ty for all the help to.....um.... those of u who helped me.... for quest help on this quest go to http://runehq.com/RHQQuestsView.php?id=00146?English=true its the dragon slayer quest help
i hope i was aloud to do that

item.title: FINally!
item.dc:creator: @tryed_to_hack_it tryed to hack it
item.description:
@tryed_to_hack_it wrote:

I’m aiming to lvl 65 combat, then I plan to go and do lost city, then get to lvl 70 (or at least lvl 60 attack) and sell my rune hally (or g maul whatever I have at that time), and buy a dragon longsword

Read full topic

item.title: FINally!
item.dc:creator: @zoltanman zoltanman
item.description:
@zoltanman wrote:

existingqwer:

Lol yeah when you become a member and do monkey madness or desert treasure you’re going to be in for a shock.

just let the gnomes drain it mostly. and range the piece of shit.

and DT isn’t a real quest, it’s actually quite shitty. took me not that long to finish it. Getting the ancient magicks was fun though . But try to finish all the sub quests, then the finish of Recipe for disaster, you would be in a treat for that.

item.title: FINally!
item.dc:creator: @Rune_Hacker1 Rune Hacker
item.description:
@Rune_Hacker1 wrote:

existingqwer:

Lol yeah when you become a member and do monkey madness or desert treasure you’re going to be in for a shock.

Monkey Madness?? I did that quest with like 55 range, 65 combat, and crappy stuff like 100 mith arrows, did the entire quest without eating a single piece of food, just a couple prayer pots. Never had a single problem with it(and for the puzzle, I did that in like 3 minutes)
